AnswerKey.Name: DEFAULT
AnswerKey.ValidTrueComment: Interactive logon message displaying legal text message. Cannot be displayed for Amazon Workspaces. Dispalying banner would result in the inoperarability of the Workspace. Reference JFFT STIG Policy and Documentation Guidance artifact. Copy is posted to the eMASS artifact page and the JFFT sharepoint portals on NIPR and SIPR.

AnswerKey.ValidTrueComment: Reference JFFT STIG Policy and Documentation Guidance artifact. Copy is posted to the eMASS artifact page and the JFFT sharepoint portals on NIPR and SIPR.

AnswerKey.Name: DEFAULT
AnswerKey.ValidTrueComment: Discovered SIDs are either the BUILTIN\Administrator or an approved Authenticated User.
AnswerKey.ValidFalseComment: One or more listed SIDs is not an approved Authenticated user.

AnswerKey.ValidFalseComment: One or more SIDs do not belong in Administrators group.

AnswerKey.Name: DEFAULT
AnswerKey.ValidTrueComment: AO Accepted Risk for this vulnerability due to virtualization. Reference POAM CM-6.5 for Credential Guard which also includes this security check.

AnswerKey.Name: DEFAULT
AnswerKey.ValidTrueComment: edc 20MAY2022 - As per JFFT STIG Policy and Documentation Guidance (20220325) HBSS HIDS (or HIPS) is not required on JFFT enclave boundary Network Intrusion Devices (NIDs).

AnswerKey.Name: DEFAULT
AnswerKey.ValidTrueComment: AO Accepted Risk for this vulnerability due to virtualization. Reference POAM CM-6.5 for Credential Guard. Downgrade this check to CAT2 based on following mitigations: The use of Microsoft Local Administrator Password Solution (LAPS), strict password change requirement (60 days or less), Strict separation of roles and duties. Server administrator credentials cannot be used on Windows 10 desktop to administer it. and Boundary Protection that is currently in place to protect from vulnerabilities in the network/servers..
